code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./CartPage.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CartPage(){const[cart,setCart]=useState(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart'))||[]);const removeFromCart=id=>{const updatedCart=cart.filter(item=>item.id!==id);setCart(updatedCart);localStorage.setItem('cart',JSON.stringify(updatedCart));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Your Cart"}),cart.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Your cart is empty"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:cart.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.image,alt:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price: $",item.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>removeFromCart(item.id),children:"Remove"})]})]},item.id))})]});}export default CartPage;
